Posts.EditableText:
May I use sub-folders inside my game's folder or must all files like pictures and music be at the main folder?

How the game files must be organized if I plan emailing the game to a friend or playtester?
Posts.HTML:
May I use sub-folders inside my game's folder or must all files like pictures and music be at the main folder?

How the game files must be organized if I plan emailing the game to a friend or playtester?

Posts.EditableText: I'm pretty sure they have to be in the same folder.  https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/publishing.html
Posts.HTML: I'm pretty sure they have to be in the same folder. https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/publishing.html

Posts.EditableText: When you add a picture or a sound to a game, the file gets copied to the main folder in any case, so yeah, that's where they have to be.
Posts.HTML: When you add a picture or a sound to a game, the file gets copied to the main folder in any case, so yeah, that's where they have to be.
